# Accessory

**Structure**

Represents an accessory to be tracked.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Accessory
```

## Structures

- **Accessory.LocationName**: Location names to fetch transforms defined on accessories. Some pre-defined location names that are common to accessories conforming to the OpenXR spec are provided as a convenience. These are not required to exist on all accessories.

## Initializers

- **init(device:)**: Initializes an accessory from a GCDevice.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of this accessory.
- **id**: The unique identifier of this accessory.
- **inherentChirality**: The hand that this accessory is designed to be held in.
- **locations**: A list of locations on this accessory for which coordinate transforms are provided.
- **name**: The name of the accessory.
- **source**: The input source used to create this accessory.
- **usdzFile**: USDZ file representing this accessory, if present.

## Enumerations

- **Accessory.Chirality**: The hand which an accessory corresponds to.
- **Accessory.Source**: Type of source an Accessory was loaded from.

## Accessory tracking

- **AccessoryTrackingProvider**: Provides the real time position of accessories in the user’s environment.
- **AccessoryAnchor**: Represents a tracked accessory.
- **Tracking accessories in volumetric windows**: Translate the position and velocity of tracked handheld accessories to throw virtual balls at a stack of cans.
- **Tracking a handheld accessory as a virtual sculpting tool**: Use a tracked accessory with Apple Vision Pro to create a virtual sculpture.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
